content:
âœ… Approved the contribution.
Comment: Nice clash idea, pretty simple but complex enough to be fun.

Thought Hexaghost would have a 6x attack that scaled to the warrior's health too, but then that would get very complex and counter-act the brute-force tests with high health, so it makes sense this way. ;)

âœ… Approved the contribution.
Comment: Clever clash, i like the way you make an 'anti-brute-force'

âœ… Approved the contribution.
Comment: Extremely simple modulo task, and yet 'anti-bruteforce', I love it

Seriously >:(
The intention is to make this not work so I will increase the constraints.

Haha I see you play STS too :)

I thought about including turn 1 divider (the attack you mentioned only happens on turn 1), since theres a formula on the wiki for that. Also thought about including strength scaling which is what inflame actually does. But the former would just be a meaningless extra step and the latter would make it more about arithmetic series which might be too tricky for clash.

Yeah, I'm addicted, haha. I play the daily climb almost every day.

I think the way you did this is a good fit for a clash.
